additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Saccharin, Pigment Red 57 CI 15850. Preservatives: Hydroxybenzoates 1.6mg/g. 4.2g stick, lip

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not use if blister seal is broken. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use on infants under 12 months of age. Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun and wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear. Keep product out of eyes. If rash or irritation occurs, stop use and see your doctor. PABA Free

description: The original and delicious Strawberry that moisturises, soothes and prevents dry, chapped lips. With SPF15 for high protection against sun damage, and moisturising action to keep lips looking and feeling great every day!
name: Strawberry Lip Balm SPF 15+
